title: pes cse (pessat) vs kiit cse
content: is it worth the extra money through pessat?

comments.body: I'm also an aspirant but ik seniors in kiit, apparently it's not a good clg, it's very overcrowded and most of the crowd is like non serious crowd, basically you can say it's like srm but in North, pes is far better I feel
Placements/ROI are better in PES CSE if ur an academic student. Also you can try or aim for scholarships , they aren't too hard to get. It's also in Bangalore and i'd recommend it
You need to be in the top 144 out of 720 CS students to get a 40% fee refund. If you think its possible for you, go for pes
Shouldn't it be top 180? Top 5% get 50% refund, next 20% get 40% refund?

Pes is also overcrowded. In MCA this year 30/240 students placed.

But yeah! in KIIT MCA batch 440 students are there in a batch.
no in orientation that bald dude said top 144

I thought he said every 1 in 4 kid gets some form of scholarship at PESU. Also, the website states what I said, I recently checked
